title: Comtech wins $48 million U.S. Army contract for satellite modems
summary: he U.S. Army awarded Comtech Telecommunications a $48.6 million contract to develop a satellite modem that can connect to multiple networks

title: Axiom Space partners with Prada on Artemis spacesuits
summary: Axiom Space has selected an unconventional partner to assist in its development of spacesuits that will be worn by the next NASA astronauts to walk on the moon: Prada.

title: First Intuitive Machines lunar lander ready for launch
summary: Intuitive Machines’ first lunar lander is complete and ready to ship for a launch next month as executives say they’re cautiously optimistic about the prospects of a successful landing.

title: McCarthy Ousted as Speaker of the House
summary: A small group of ultra-conservative House Republicans ousted Kevin McCarthy as their party leader today. Eight House Freedom Caucus members joined all Democrats in voting in favor of a motion […]

title: Ars takes a close-up look at the first US lunar lander in half a century
summary: "Our strategy is being there and being ready to go."
